title: Looking for T206 portraits - trade stuff inside (MORE stuff added)
author: ZachS

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 portraits - trade stuff inside (MORE stuff added)
posts.post_content:
Like the title says, I'm looking for portraits. I have a few items for trade below.



MATTY!

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/e95matty_zpsb7af2da2.jpg[/IMG]

Mickey!

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/mantle_zpsba7ad7ca.jpg[/IMG]


T3 Wagner - be the first kid on your block to own this extremely rare... reprint. The scan has some odd looking spots in it, but this reprint is in excellent condition and comes in it's own plastic sleeve. A REAL PLASTIC SLEEVE!

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/t3wagner_zps4bdb7b8a.jpg[/IMG]


T206 McGlynn (name on top and bottom) - 2 names for the price of 1

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/mcglynn_zps765569c9.jpg[/IMG]

Zack Wheat 3x5 auto w/ Perez Steele postcard

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/wheatfront_zps8c0b9cb6.jpg[/IMG]

M116 Bill Bradley - not to be confused with Bill Brasky 

[IMG]http://i813.photobucket.com/albums/zz58/ztigerdroppings/m116bradley_zps20fd9726.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/5_zps104682f7.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

Those aren't very good baseball shoes she is wearing. I hope she doesn't have to beat out an infield hit :)
She's wearing those shoes on purpose so she will trip & get an obstruction call.
What you don't see is the large spike under the heel... this lady knows exactly what she's doing.

I genuinely LOL'd at the Bill Brasky reference.  I used to party with a guy who went by the name Bill Brasky.  I don't think anyone ever knew his real last name.  Only guy I ever knew to get a RWI for riding his bike into a ditch after a few pitchers of PBR.  Good dude.

posts.post_title: I love the Two Lovely Misses.

posts.post_content: I replied to your first PM and must have missed the second. I just sent you a reply.

Hey, Zach--

Did you get the scans I sent by email yesterday?

I dug up a bunch more of graded portraits, and I'm interested in your new stuff [Mathewson] as well.  I'll send you a list and scans if you'll email me; thanks.

Doug

Added some more stuff.

Here's the checklist of T206 portraits I have: [URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3SYnL0EYQf7Z3FudkJZUnhQVEk/edit?usp=sharing"]CHECKLIST[/URL]

If it's not highlighted, I need it!

Zach,

Got your package this morning, having just returned home from the top of the world in Auburn, CA.
I figure I'll give the Misses to my niece who plays college softball.

Thanks again for your friendly trade.

I'm also interested in a couple of your new listings; look for my email.

Doug

Doug, I replied to your email. Thanks.


Also, the T206 Mathewson (dark cap) has been traded.

Zach, 

Got Sheckard and Lattimore; thanks.

Doug
